```{r}
fill_df <- function(res, df, category)
{
  for(i in 1:length(res))
  {
    
    df_row <- data.frame(t(res[[i]]$df[category]), row.names=NULL)
    colnames(df_row) <-  t(res[[i]]$df["CellID"])
    
    
    df_row <- cbind(Image = res[[i]]$filename[[1]], df_row)
    df <- merge(df, df_row, all.x = TRUE, all.y= TRUE)
  }
  return(df)
}
```


```{r}
df_pm_mpi <- fill_df(res,df_pm_mpi, "cell_mpi")
df_vac_mpi <- fill_df(res,df_vac_mpi, "vac_mpi")
df_pm_vac_ratio <- fill_df(res,df_pm_vac_ratio, "PM_vac_ratio")
```

```{r}

write.csv(t(df_pm_mpi), paste0("Results-Unanalyzed/pm_mpi_final.csv"), na = "", row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(t(df_vac_mpi), paste0("Results-Unanalyzed/vac_mpi_final.csv"), na = "", row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(t(df_pm_vac_ratio), paste0("Results-Unanalyzed/pm_vac_ratio_final.csv"), na = "", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
get_image_names <- function(res)
{
  image_names = vector(mode = "list",length = length(res))
  for(i in 1:length(res))
  {
    image_names[i] <- res[[i]]$filename
  }
  return(image_names)
}
```




```{r}
get_max_cells <- function(res)
{
  max = -1
  for(i in 1:length(res))
  {
    if( max < nrow(res[[i]]$df["cell_mpi"]))
      max = nrow(res[[i]]$df["cell_mpi"])
  }
  return(max)
}

```


```{r}
max_cells <- get_max_cells(res)
```
